card.name: Chart a Course
card.text: Draw two cards. Then discard a card unless you attacked this turn.

card.name: Cosmium Confluence
card.text: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Search your library for a Cave card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. • Put three +1/+1 counters on a Cave you control. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land. • Destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Deep-Cavern Bat
card.text: Flying, lifelink When Deep-Cavern Bat enters the battlefield, look at target opponent's hand. You may exile a nonland card from it until Deep-Cavern Bat leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Didact Echo

card.name: Geological Appraiser
card.text: When Geological Appraiser enters the battlefield, if you cast it, discover 3. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)

card.text: When Growing Rites of Itlimoc enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. card.name: Huatli, Poet of Unity

card.name: Roar of the Fifth People
card.text: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.) I — Create two 3/3 green Dinosaur creature tokens. II — Roar of the Fifth People gains "Creatures you control have '{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.'" III — Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. IV — Dinosaurs you control gain double strike and trample until end of turn.
